57279.name: Solipsism

Intelligence provides no inherent bonus to Energy Shield
2% reduced Duration of Elemental Ailments on you per 15 Intelligence
reminderText: (Elemental Ailments are Ignited, Scorched, Chilled, Frozen, Brittle, Shocked, and Sapped)
flavourText: To know yourself is to understand existence - and understanding brings control.

items.name: Watcher's Eye
explicitMods: 6% increased maximum Energy Shield
4% increased maximum Life
5% increased maximum Mana
8% additional Physical Damage Reduction while affected by Determination
25% chance to Impale Enemies on Hit with Attacks while using Pride
Impales you inflict last 2 additional Hits while using Pride
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: One by one, they stood their ground against a creature
they had no hope of understanding, let alone defeating,
and one by one, they became a part of it.

items.name: Natural Affinity
implicitMods: Corrupted Blood cannot be inflicted on you
explicitMods: Adds Nature's Patience
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Small, Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: You can take the girl out of the woods,
but you can't take the woods out of the girl.

items.name: Ancestral Vision
explicitMods: +10 to Dexterity
Modifiers to Chance to Suppress Spell Damage also apply to Chance to Avoid Elemental Ailments at 50% of their Value
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: The spirits of our ancestors guided us from the Archipelago to the continent.
Inextricably, the purity of our souls is linked to the ones who came before us.

items.name: Dusk Chant
explicitMods: 16% increased Global Physical Damage
7% increased maximum Life
+9% to all Elemental Resistances
+12% to Cold and Lightning Resistances
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Glyph Curio
enchantMods: 2 Added Passive Skills are Jewel Sockets

Added Small Passive Skills grant: Axe Attacks deal 12% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments
Added Small Passive Skills grant: Sword Attacks deal 12% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +4% to Cold Resistance
1 Added Passive Skill is Martial Prowess
1 Added Passive Skill is Run Through
1 Added Passive Skill is Wound Aggravation
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Honour Bliss
enchantMods: 2 Added Passive Skills are Jewel Sockets

Added Small Passive Skills grant: Axe Attacks deal 12% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments
Added Small Passive Skills grant: Sword Attacks deal 12% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +5% to Cold Resistance
1 Added Passive Skill is Martial Prowess
1 Added Passive Skill is Run Through
1 Added Passive Skill is Wound Aggravation
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Forbidden Flame
explicitMods: Allocates Valako, Storm's Embrace if you have the matching modifier on Forbidden Flesh
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: The minds of those studied utterly by the Cleansing Fire
continue to think and dream and beg for silence...

items.name: Impossible Escape
explicitMods:
Passives in Radius of Imbalanced Guard can be Allocated
without being connected to your tree
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: She was the last of countless progeny bred to test the limits of limitless power.
In the cosmic prison of her birth, her siblings fought each other to the death
for supremacy. She alone reached her limit... and broke through.

items.name: Thread of Hope
explicitMods: Only affects Passives in Large Ring
Passives in Radius can be Allocated without being connected to your tree
-10% to all Elemental Resistances
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: Though we cannot touch; one thought, one wish, through centuries alone in darkness.

items.name: Glorious Vanity
explicitMods:
Bathed in the blood of 5655 sacrificed in the name of Doryani
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Vaal
Historic
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: They believed themselves the pinnacle of civilisation, but that height toppled their empire.

items.name: Forbidden Flesh
explicitMods: Allocates Valako, Storm's Embrace if you have the matching modifier on Forbidden Flame
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: The bodies of those wholly subsumed by the Tangle
continue to merge and mutate and cry out for release...

109.name: Nature's Patience
stats:
Gain 2 Grasping Vines each second while stationary
2% chance to deal Double Damage per Grasping Vine
1% less Damage taken per Grasping Vine
reminderText: (Up to 10 Vines can grasp you, inflicting 8% less Movement Speed per Vine. Broken by moving)
flavourText: To win, all you must do is outlast.

Sword Attacks deal 12% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments
reminderText: (Ailments that deal Damage are Bleeding, Ignited, and Poisoned)
